Name: Forest Formation
Description in forms: Woody vegetation with arboreal or arboreal-shrub species, with continuous canopy dominance.

Name: Savanna Formation
Description in forms: Open plant formation with a more or less developed shrub and/or tree layer, herbaceous layer always present.

Name: Mangrove
Description in forms: Dense and Evergreen Forest formations, often flooded by tide and  associated with the mangrove coastal ecosystem.

Name: Wooded Sandbank Vegetation
Description in forms: Forest formations that are established on sandy soils or on dunes in the coastal zone.

Name: Wetland
Description in forms: Herbaceous vegetation with a predominance of grasses subject to permanent or temporary flooding (at least once a year) according to natural flood pulses. The woody element can be present on the grassland matrix forming a mosaic with shrub or tree plants.

Name: Grassland
Description in forms: Vegetation with a predominance of grassy herbaceous stratum, with the presence of isolated shrubs and stunted woody plants. The botanical composition is influenced by edaphic and topographic gradients and by pastoral management (livestock). Patches of invasive exotic vegetation or forage use (planted pasture) may be present forming mosaics with native vegetation

Name: Salt-Flat
Description in forms: Apicuns or Salt flats are formations often without tree vegetation,  associated to a higher, hypersaline and less flooded area in the  mangrove, generally in the transition between this area and the  continent.

Name: Rocky Outcrop
Description in forms: Rocks naturally exposed on the earth's surface without soil cover, often with partial presence of rupicolous vegetation and high slope.

Name: Herbaceus Sandbank Vegetation
Description in forms: Herbaceous vegetation established on sandy soils or on dunes in the coastal zone.

Name: Pasture
Description in forms: Pasture area, predominantly planted, linked livestock production  activities.

Name: Soybean
Description in forms: Areas cultivated with soybean

Name: Sugar cane
Description in forms: Cultivated areas with sugar cane.

Name: Rice
Description in forms: Areas cultivated with rice, exclusively under irrigation

Name: Cotton
Description in forms: Areas cultivated with cotton cultivation.

Name: Other Temporary Crops
Description in forms: Areas occupied with short or medium-term agricultural crops,  generally with a vegetative cycle of less than one year, which after  harvesting need to be planted again to produce.

Name: Coffe
Description in forms: Areas cultivated with coffee plantation.

Name: Citrus
Description in forms: Areas cultivated with citrus cultivation.

Name: Other Perennial Crops
Description in forms: Areas occupied with agricultural crops with a long vegetative cycle  (more than one year), which allow successive harvests, without the  need for new planting

Name: Forest Plantation
Description in forms: Tree species planted for commercial purposes (e.g. pinus, eucalyptus,  araucaria).

Name: Mosaic of Uses
Description in forms: Areas of agricultural use, where it was not possible to distinguish between pasture and agriculture. It may include areas of crops, winter or summer pastures and horticulture. Includes rest areas between agricultural crops (fallow).

Name: Beach Dune and Sand Spot
Description in forms: Sandy areas, with bright white color, where there is no vegetation  predominance of any kind.

Name: Urban Area
Description in forms: Urban areas with predominance of non-vegetated surfaces, including  roads, highways and constructions.

Name: Mining
Description in forms: Areas where clear signs of extensive mineral extractions are present,  shows clear exposure of the soil by the action of heavy machinery.

Name: River Lake Ocean
Description in forms: Rivers, lakes, dams, reservoir and other water bodies

Name: Aquaculture
Description in forms: Artificial lakes, where aquaculture and/or salt production activities  predominate

Name: Road Very Light Traffic
Description in forms: Road Very Light Traffic

Name: Road Light Traffic
Description in forms: Road Light Traffic

Name: Road Moderate Traffic
Description in forms: Road Moderate Traffic

Name: Road Heavy Traffic
Description in forms: Road Heavy Traffic

Name: Rail Road
Description in forms: Rail Road

Name: Eolic Generation Infrastructure
Description in forms: Eolic Generation Infrastructure

Name: Other Non-Forest Formation
Description in forms: Not asked

Name: Other Non-vegetaded area
Description in forms: Not asked

Name: Floodable Forest
Description in forms: Not asked

Name: Palm Oil
Description in forms: Not asked
